revisionDesc.change: moved notes to external file and added ptrs; checked
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Proofreading corrections; date of letter, allaying Walt's health concerns revise Jeff and Matty notes and correct;

body.p:
i was sorry my being so late last week with my letter caused you any uneasiness if any thing was the matter with me more than common you would be advised of it my dear walter
so if any thing occurs that i dont don't write as usual you must not think any thing unusalunusual is the matter) i got the order walter last saturdaySaturday and was going down to day to get the money but the wind blew so hard i was afraid to venture it rained here last night very hard) i am about as usual i have had rather bad pains in my limbs
lately otherwise i am about as usual i think every morning if i could give you a cup of coffee i should be glad i am pretty lonesome evenings edd goes to church almost every night i hope you can come for a week some time this winter) you must write next week all about your new quarters how you like your room that fronts the south i shouldent shouldn't have thought any thing about its fronting the north or south) not one word have i had from Jeff or matt or han or mary
